channel.title: Make npc death tele u
channel.description:
how would i make it so when a specific npc dies u get telee
--trying to make my first minigame
thanks

item.title: Make npc death tele u
item.dc:creator: @dylan.hurley dylan.hurley
item.description:
@dylan.hurley wrote:

That ^^^^ is for delta
For pi it’s in npc handler just look up case for jad in npchandler.java

Read full topic

item.title: Make npc death tele u
item.dc:creator: @xneonx xneonx
item.description:
@xneonx wrote:

I know this is spoonfeeding but I really don’t care. This is a sample used from the fire cape mini-game. Open up npchandler.java

if (npcs[i].npcType == 2745) { temp.sendFrame200(4901, 591); temp.sendFrame126(temp.GetNpcName(2617), 4902); temp.sendFrame126("", 4903); temp.sendFrame126("You even defeated TzTok-Jad, I am most impressed!", 4904); temp.sendFrame126("Please accept this gift as a reward.", 4905); temp.sendFrame126("", 4906); temp.sendFrame75(2617, 4901); temp.sendFrame164(4900); temp.toX = 2439; temp.toY = 5169; temp.heightLevel = 0;
The temp.toX is the x coord that you will be teled on the npc’s death and the temp.toY is pretty self explanatory. Just change the npc type and the other frames to what you want or delete them.

Read full topic
